attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are a true football fan and want to see football ticket prices lowered so us true fans can go go to games with out having having to worry about finance sign this. Football is a working class sport, Its about time more working class people got the chance to go

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
